sqlMap.statement:
SELECT DMO.DOC_MGT_ORG_DESC_TXT AS DOC_MGT_ORG_CD ,DMB.DOC_MGT_SCAN_BR_CD AS DOC_MGT_SCAN_BR_CD ,DMB.DOC_MGT_SCAN_BR_NM AS DOC_MGT_SCAN_BR_NM ,DMB.DOC_MGT_SCAN_RG_NM AS DOC_MGT_SCAN_RG_NM ,DMB.DOC_MGT_SCAN_ZN_NM AS DOC_MGT_SCAN_ZN_NM ,DMB.DEF_ORD_PROC_PSN_CD AS DEF_ORD_PROC_PSN_CD ,DMB.DEF_BR_ADMIN_PSN_CD AS DEF_BR_ADMIN_PSN_CD ,DMB.LEASE_CMPY_PROC_PSN_CD AS LEASE_CMPY_PROC_PSN_CD ,DMB.PO_PEND_EML_ADDR AS PO_PEND_EML_ADDR ,DMB.INV_PKG_PEND_EML_ADDR AS INV_PKG_PEND_EML_ADDR ,DMB.PO_ISS_EML_ADDR AS PO_ISS_EML_ADDR ,DMB.DOC_MGT_SCAN_BR_CD || DMO.DOC_MGT_ORG_NM AS DOC_MGT_SCAN_BR_ID FROM DOC_MGT_BR DMB ,DOC_MGT_ORG DMO WHERE DMB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DMB.DOC_MGT_ORG_CD = #docMgtOrdCd# AND DMB.DOC_MGT_SCAN_BR_CD = #docMgtScanBrCd# AND DMB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND DMO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DMO.DOC_MGT_ORG_CD = DMB.DOC_MGT_ORG_CD AND DMO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT DMI.IDX_ATTRB_TRGT_COL_NM ,DMI.DOC_MGT_FLD_CD ,DMF.DOC_MGT_FLD_NUM ,DMF.DOC_MGT_FLD_TP_CD ,DMF.DOC_MGT_FLD_DESC_TXT ,DMC.DOC_MGT_CATG_CD ,DMC.DOC_MGT_CATG_NUM FROM DOC_MGT_IDX_ATTRB_DFN DMI ,DOC_MGT_FLD DMF ,DOC_MGT_CATG DMC WHERE DMI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DMI.DOC_MGT_CATG_CD = #docMgtCatgCd# AND DMI.ACTV_FLG = 'Y' AND DMI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND DMI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DMF.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DMI.DOC_MGT_FLD_CD = DMF.DOC_MGT_FLD_CD AND DMF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND DMI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DMC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DMI.DOC_MGT_CATG_CD = DMC.DOC_MGT_CATG_CD AND DMC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
